label8: Optical VR image stabilization keeps the shot steady (even if your hands are not)
label9: You won't have to worry about camera settings-Easy Auto Mode makes all the control decisions for you
label4: Capture close-ups from telephoto distances or dramatic low-light images
label6: When life is action-packed, you need a camera that takes great photos and videos without interrupting the fun
label7: Zoom way in with a 14x optical Zoom-NIKKOR ED glass lens
autofocusaffocusareaselection: Auto (9-area automatic selection), Centre, Face priority, Manual with 99 focus areas, Subject tracking
label18: The COOLPIX L610's highly sensitive 16.0-megapixel CMOS sensor lets you shoot with confidence in the most challenging conditions
label19: You'll create brilliant photos and Full HD (1080p) videos in nearly any lighting situation-indoors without a flash, during sunsets, on cloudy days, beside nighttime cityscapes and more
approxweight: 8.5 oz. (240g) With battery and SD memory card
label13: When the action starts, you want to catch it-sometimes from a safe distance
label10: Fire off blazing fast 16-megapixel action sequences, even after the sun goes down
label11: Since the COOLPIX L610 uses regular AA batteries, you'll never be without power
label16: And whether near or far, your photos and videos will be razor-sharp, thanks to built-in Optical VR image stabilization
label14: With the COOLPIX L610's powerful telephoto Zoom-NIKKOR ED glass lens, you can zoom in on your subject from amazingly far away
label15: Extreme macro shots are just as easy. The COOLPIX L610 lets you get as close as 1 cm from your subject

label23: When you're shooting fast action, you don't have time to fuss with camera settingsEasy Auto Mode automatically detects what you're shooting and selects the best Scene Mode (from among 6) for the situation
label21: Target Finding AF ensures your subject is in focus in every frame
label20: When the action speeds up, no problem! The COOLPIX L610 has ultra-fast framing rates and can fire up to 1.9 shots per second (4 shots) for exciting action sequences
label26: Some stories can only be told with a movie. When that moment happens, just touch the COOLPIX L610's movie record button and you'll instantly be recording in Full HD (1080p) with stereo sound
label24: For more challenging situations, choose one of the camera's 19 Scene Modes like Night Portrait, Night Landscape, Backlighting and more, and the COOLPIX L610 will make sure you get great results
label29: It also accepts alkaline, lithium type and Nikon rechargeable batteries, available as an optional accessory
label28: The COOLPIX L610 can run on two regular AA batteries, so a fresh set of batteries will never be far out of reach
